Значения

Наказывать; научиться на горьком опыте

Мнемоника

Горький опыт формирует признаки 徴 сердца 心. Кто-то ожесточается, а кто-то умнеет и добреет.

Варианты

懲, 惩

WaniKani_Reading_Info: In the 潮 kanji you saved Mrs. Chou from dying, so he is chastising you for it.

humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " heart " and " zheng ", the original meaning is punishment. "Shuowen": "Yeah. From the heart to the sound." "Poetry·Lu Song·Yugong": "Rong Di is a sham, Jing Shu is a punishment." Kong Yingdashu: "Jing Chu Qunshu rebels, so so This punishes it."

" Punish " can mean stop. "Poetry‧ Xiaoya‧ Mianshui": "The people's wrong words are better than the punishment." Mao Chuan: "Punish, stop."

" Punish " also means suffering. "Liezi·Tangwen": "The Fool of Beishan, who is ninety years old, lives in front of the mountain, punishes the fortress of the north of the mountain, enters and exits in a roundabout way, gathers the room and seeks.

" Punish " also expresses fear. "The Book of Han-Chu Yuan Wang Liu Jiao Chuan": "The wife is married to the Queen Mother Dou, and punishes the invaders in Shandong, asks to stay in the capital, and asks her."

" Punish " also means to ascend. "Selected Works‧Zhang Heng "Sixuan Fu"": "The Ji Bo is punishing and clearing with the wind." Old Note: "Punish, Teng Ye."

humanum_full_description:
從「心」，「徵」聲，本義為懲罰。《說文》：「㣻也。从心，徵聲。」《詩‧魯頌‧閟宮》：「戎狄是膺，荊舒是懲。」孔穎達疏：「荊楚群舒叛逆者，於是以此懲創之。」

　　「懲」可表示制止。《詩‧小雅‧沔水》：「民之訛言，寧莫之懲。」毛傳：「懲，止也。」

　　「懲」也表示苦於。《列子‧湯問》：「北山愚公者，年且九十，面山而居，懲山北之塞，出入之迂也，聚室而謀。」

　　「懲」還表示恐懼。《漢書‧楚元王劉交傳》：「太夫人與竇太后有親，懲山東之寇，求留京師，詔許之。」

　　「懲」亦表示升騰。《文選‧張衡〈思玄賦〉》：「屬箕伯以函風兮，懲淟涊而為清。」舊注：「懲，騰也。」
